statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 3 , -18 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x + 20 , -6 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 4 , -36 \, x^{3} - 17 \, x^{2} - 24 \, x + 32 , 3 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 6\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
